replaced.title: The Xiaomi Mijia BLE Temperature and Humidity Sensor integration has been replaced
replaced.description:
The Xiaomi Mijia BLE Temperature and Humidity Sensor integration stopped working in Vioneta Agro 2022.7 and was replaced by the Xiaomi BLE integration in the 2022.8 release.

There is no migration path possible, therefore, you have to add your Xiaomi Mijia BLE device using the new integration manually.

Your existing Xiaomi Mijia BLE Temperature and Humidity Sensor YAML configuration is no longer used by Vioneta Agro. Remove the YAML configuration from your configuration.yaml file and restart Vioneta Agro to fix this issue.
